name: Barista
ability: Each night, until dusk, 1) a player becomes sober, healthy & gets true info, or 2) their ability works twice. They learn which.

legacy.otherNightReminder: The Barista chooses a player and an effect: 1) sober, healthy, true info, or 2) ability works twice. Wake that player and show them the appropriate effect.

otherNights.description: Each night, until dusk, 1) a player becomes sober, healthy & gets true info, or 2) their ability works twice.

information.customMessage: Choose a player and effect: sober/healthy/true info or ability x2.
